website_summaries.verdict: Skiers who prefer thinner socks will appreciate the comfort these socks provide; but they aren't the warmest choice on our shortlist.
pros: Offers a comfortably snug fit on most wearers
Fairly thin design fits nicely in the majority of boot styles
cons: They have the tendency to shrink after being washed
Though the thin fit is comfortable, it's not ideal for extremely cold temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Good ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Wore these skiing this past weekend and they were as advertised. Overall good comfortable. I have thick calves so thick socks aren't the best for me in ski boots. These kept my feet warm all day. I had previously worn cabela's or REI brand wool socks when skiiing and found them to be too scratchy over the course of the day. These did not irritate my legs.
customer_reviews.author: GF Baking

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 10. Large fit perfect. Came up to just under my knee. Sock fits tight but not too tight. Stayed in place. Kept my feet warm. I never had a problem of cold toes while skiing. I only had to wear this pair of socks rather than multiple socks to keep warm, I like that one sock was for the right foot and the other was marked left foot. Very comfortable sock. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic ski socks
customer_reviews.text: These are just as advertised. They are thin enough to fit and thick enough to adda bitof warmth. I wish the wool content was higher but they are quite comfortable. As an everyday skier these probably wouldn't be my next purchase but if you are a vacation skier these are perfect and a great value.I am happy with the purchase and service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: which depending on the weather can be a good or bad thing
customer_reviews.text: I got x-large because I wear size 11 shoes. These socks felt kind of small though. They fit snug on the first try, and after going through the washer/dryer once It got a little tighter. I wore them out on a snowboard trip and they were extremely warm, which depending on the weather can be a good or bad thing. I wish they were a little larger, which is probably my only downside about them.
customer_reviews.author: Darshan Karkar

customer_reviews.title: What An Unexpected Pleasure
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleasantly surprised by these socks. I have sensitive feet and the socks looked a tad "busy". But my concerns were dispelled after just a minute wearing them. I LOVE the "L" and "R" imprinted on the socks! Nice touch. I wear them quite often and will probably wear them out before ski season ends.
customer_reviews.author: Techno Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a week at Snowmass, Aspen, Aspen Highlands and Buttermilk.... your socks worked very well I'm very happy with them, they felt great on my feet very comfortable, very thin. I'm a snowboard I had great feel of my board and boots with the socks and they kept my feet warm, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The PureAthlete Warm Skiing Socks are great ski socks! They are soft - not itchy or scratchy and they keep your feet warm while skiing. If you like a thin ski sock, these are for you. If you have room for a slighter thicker sock, the PureAthlete Wool Skiing Snowboard Socks are a little warmer. I am 5'8" inches and weigh 150 pounds and wear a women's size 9 shoe - the Large / X-Large fit perfectly. I like that they reach all the way to my knee and don't fall down.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ann in Anacortes

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these - great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. Not too bulky. Good for the muck-boots when you've got to get out and shovel snow & spend an afternoon with the snow blower. . . they really stay put instead of gradually sliding down your calf and bunching up in your boots. These will also do nicely with motorcycle boots this year. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: James Sasser

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT call these "SKI Socks"
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY these if you intend on using them for winter sports and want warm feet and toes. Might as well wear 'dress socks' while skiing because these are really no better. They might look like performance ski socks but I'm surprised these are allowed to masquerade as "Best Lightweight Warm Skiing Socks" on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Overall kept my feet and toes warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: Overall kept my feet warm for a long while. Not entirely waterproof but did a good job for what they are. At the end of a 4 hour ski day my toes were starting to get cold and a bit damp. These socks I think held up better than if I were to wear normal everyday socks or just warm ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great innovation that I should order even in the winter ...
customer_reviews.text: As an employee in the Kroger Freezer, I used this product to replace the battery powered insole to keep my feet and toes warm. It worked miraculously. Wow! This is a great innovation that I should order even in the winter times.
customer_reviews.author: David Senabulya

customer_reviews.title: These socks work very well and the fit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these socks a week ago and used a pair skiing the other day. The socks fit very well and was nicely snug all through out while skiing. It also kept my feet warm - no issues whatsoever. The outside temperature at the time was about 15 degrees (F) and steady snow. I would buy these again and recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: JoeV

customer_reviews.title: Two pair last year convinced me they are all I want to wear this ski season
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks; warm and comfortable without being too thick. They also provide support without being difficult to get on. Having a left and right sock took some getting used to. I just make sure I start by putting the left sock on the right foot, then only the right sock is left to put on the bare foot that is left, so the sock that is left on the foot that is left will be the right sock on the right foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mildly bemused Max

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. A mild compression sock that does not fall down (but is not difficult to put on). Kept my feet comfortable in 26 degree weather. Will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Manzanita

customer_reviews.title: Cold feet in Texas, fear a Utah winter...
customer_reviews.text: Fit is nice. I wore camping and my feet froze. Not looking forward to ski trip in a month if they didn't keep my feet warn in Texas fall tent camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the combination of lightweight and compression
customer_reviews.text: I got these socks for the compression value, wanting something lightweight and that would wear more than one day without the need to launder, and that would dry quickly since I want to use them for travel. I have only had them a week and am very happy with the weight and the comfort and the ability to wear them for multiple days without laundering. I haven't yet tested how fast they dry and can't yet speak to durability, but I like what I see so far. Only gave it 4 stars because it has not yet been fully tested.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Very cold feet
customer_reviews.text: I have been skiing for quite a few years and have had a few different pairs of ski socks. i figured like most stuff on amazon i would be fairly satisfied with my purchase but thats not the case. the comfort of these socks is nothing to complain about but they are very thin and not warm. compared to my other skiing socks this are far from being "warm".
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and value .
customer_reviews.text: Surprising warm for thin material. Excellent ribbing with support in all the right places for all day comfort. Sock rises nearly to the knee and stays in place all day. Very comfortable and non-bonding. I used everyday on a 5 day ski trip to Zermatt. Temps were as low a -20c and feet were comfortable. I was riding expert slopes all day and was comfortable and well supported.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the quality of these socks. They have a great fit and they're not too bulky. The best part is they keep my feet warm on cold ski days.
customer_reviews.author: Scottwestcoast

customer_reviews.title: Very Light but Warm
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than I expected, but seems to be very warm for its weight. Plan to use, in combo with down booties, for emergency bivouac at 8,000+ elevations. Item was delivered in two days(!!) despite the fact that I went with ordinary standard shipping. Thank you, distributor.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe Joiner

customer_reviews.title: these r the best socks for where i live in michigan they keep ...
customer_reviews.text: these r the best socks for where i live in michigan they keep my feet an legs so warm an they feel so nice on my foot, i even bought some more an giving them as gifts for christmas. an i have tried other knee high socks but these r by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: simplyredd

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight ski socks
customer_reviews.text: They were as advertised - fit perfectly - I’m a size 5 and was looking for a thin sock with light shin padding. The color is fun too! I bought the blue ones too, but maybe those are for men because what I thought was the same size is bigger in person. Still work though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Marquie

customer_reviews.title: Sock appears to be simply a typical, light-weight medical ...
customer_reviews.text: Sock appears to be simply a typical, light-weight medical compression sock with graphics printed on it. Those dark colored areas on the sock are just printing and have nothing to do with the construction of the sock. Fits ok, but I haven't skiied with them yet to tell how they might work.
customer_reviews.author: Part Time

customer_reviews.title: Successful gift for my picky husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for my husband who is very picky about his ski socks. I was a little nervous but it worked out perfect. The socks are a hit. They are thin enough for his boots yet kept him warm. So happy that I bought these socks!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bergstol

customer_reviews.title: Kept amazingly warm (and comfy) all day while snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my first ever ski trip after a friend said to get knee high ski socks. I decided to snowboard that day (bad idea on my part) and the temps were high of 20 with plenty of wind and overcast skies. This was the only pair of socks I wore and I never once felt like my feet were cold in the 5 hours I was outside with only about 3 trips indoors to sign up for my lessons, eat, and get some water. They didn’t slide around or chafe and I’m considering buying more pairs as I decide I want to pursue winter sports. Would absolutely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Ragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for skiing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a week in keystone skiing and these were perfect. I appreciate that they are not bulky or thick yet they kept my feet warm all day long in 15-25 degree weather. I’d recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jer TPA

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and kept my toes toasty.
customer_reviews.text: The socks were very comfortable and fit extremely well. The most important part though is they kept my toes warm in single digit temps as a single layer in my ski boots!
customer_reviews.author: JnOviedo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit for my size 11 foot
customer_reviews.text: I finally had a chance to try out my new socks. I have a men's size 11 foot and They were really long in the shin so they covered my shin all the way up above my boot which was nice. Very comfortable and warm my feet weren't cold skiing. It was about 20• but the wind chill made it much lower. These are the only socks I wore when I was skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I am a novice skier. My first couple of times skiing, I wore regular athletic socks. I ended up with blisters and abrasions after a few hours of skiing. Wearing these Ski Socks was a fantastic improvement! My first time out with the socks was a very cold day on a Vermont mountain. My feet were comfortable and warm for the entire day. I skied for over five hours with no discomfort at all. These are terrific socks. I strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Murray

customer_reviews.title: didnt like it much
customer_reviews.text: for me, these socks are a little too large on some places and too small in others definitely not compression socks. they are not completely bad, it's just that for this price is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for skiing and hockey
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for skiing and to play ice hockey in. My skates hit me in the same cushioned area, so these work great. Comfortable, and I haven't had any bunching issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hales

customer_reviews.title: These are just socks . . .
customer_reviews.text: Nothing remarkable here - these are just over-the-calf socks. The different color areas on the socks are just that - different color. No change in thickness - just socks with a color pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but also light on warmth
customer_reviews.text: The height was great but this did not keep my feet warm in my snow boots or in my ski boots. Not great for skiing unless it's spring skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: Great Sock, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for years. Great sock great value. I ski 30-40 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great socks. They don't rub on my leg or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. They don't rub on my leg or slide down my calves at all. they're not too small, but they fit tightly to ensure no rubbing/chafing against my feet or calves while skiing (I'm a size 13 sneaker). I just finished 4 days of nonstop skiing in mammoth, and last weekend i was skiing nonstop for 5 days. no complaints whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Dygert

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. When I lay down at night my feet and calves go COLD. These socks are terrific to sleep in. For me, by keeping my feet and calves warm, it helps eliminate joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: ASBelle

customer_reviews.title: Warm toes!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about warmth because they're thin and they were inexpensive, but I had absolutely no complaints on my Colorado Ski Trip which had me skiing in temps in the teens. My toes never got cold!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cappel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sock
customer_reviews.text: This is a thin sock that made my new boots a joy to ski in. My older socks were bulky which caused foot pain and cold feet. I was a little skeptical of going to a thinner sock, but my circulation improved with these socks resulting in warmer feet.
customer_reviews.author: BDAmundson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the women's
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the deal is here, but I bought men's xl and I like them a lot. Use them in motorcycle boots
customer_reviews.author: David Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Barely qualifies as real ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Decent socks for for spring skiing but anything under 30 degrees and your feet will be cold if you're looking for warm ski socks this is not the pair you want. These are basically just a little bit better than regular socks. If you want good ski socks look for a real ski brand ones that are made in America in my opinion are far superior than others.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great skiing sock
customer_reviews.text: Great skiing sock. . .I wore just this one pair in my boot and was warm all day! We were skiing Utah where the temps were in the 20-30's. Also, smooth fit inside my boot. . .didn't bunch up or wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These look like great socks. Got them to give as a gift but they look well made. Color is awesome and fabric has a good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Waters

customer_reviews.title: thin and perfect for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: wore these with boots in weather that was around 10 to 30 degrees. Kept my feet (especially my toes!) warm. Best to wear if you don't have much room in your boots for thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Harrison

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these socks all last winter and they are still in great shape. I got 2 more pair for Christmas and they are heavenly. Warm, comfortable and last a long time. I wish I could give them 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my husband. He's been ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He's been wearing them around the house as he likes the fit and comfort. I bought them for him to use when he snow skis. He didn't get a chance to use them this year. Maybe next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri G.

customer_reviews.title: fit great, hitting slopes in Breck Jan 10th
customer_reviews.text: Will have better idea how they feel after a few runs, but they fit good and are just thick enough, but not to thick. Like a thin sock, so these should work good
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and husband and they worked well for them. Wash up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Franxswife

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting socks & warm
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting socks.... and warm- especially if you have circulation problems (cold feet)
customer_reviews.author: N Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ski socks
customer_reviews.text: Great ski sock. Thin, but very warm, exactly what you want in a ski sock. I don't wear my others anymore. I had probably a total of 10 days on the mountain with these over a couple trips and zero wear shown so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Product seemed to fray and pill after just two days ...
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to fray and pill after just two days of skiing so I don't know how many uses I will get out of them. Bought the socks because they were on sale but probably would't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: . EXTREMELY warm! My feet stayed nice and toasty through a snowmobiling and skiing. Thin enough to not crowd ski boots or tennis shoes. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duensing

customer_reviews.title: Best Ski Socks Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ski socks I’ve owned in 30 years of skiing. Perfect fit, warm, but thin enough to not feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: bigeugene

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable socks and look cool. So far only used one time skiing in very mild temp, so can't speak to warmth on cold days.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyAdams

customer_reviews.title: Just what we ordered
customer_reviews.text: These worked great during the coldest ski days of the year. Very functional and also fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Lovebooks

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very light weight and feet stayed warm , used for skiing , I like.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Warm, stylish, well made, quality product & performance.
customer_reviews.text: Ski socks are great for winter sports, and these are no exception. They were well made, comfortable and warm, used them for heavy broomball play, 3-4 hours at a time, and they performed well Have not tried them on the slopes yet, but expect same great results!
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Great and warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and best warm! I used it few times in a dense snow storm and it was perfect. Durability is a bit less but you’d expect it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Socks [Always Practice Safe Socks]
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like these socks. They are not too thick, very comfortable, keep my feet warm [& happy] and launder nicely. I can't wait for next winter so I can wear them again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan T. L.

customer_reviews.title: Well deserved 5 star recommendation for both product and service ...
customer_reviews.text: Well deserved 5 star recommendation for both product and service. Exactly as represented in the ad and more. I am picky about socks being on my feet so much of my work day and these socks are literally "game-changers".
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great in my custom fitted ski boots. Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Compression sock
customer_reviews.text: Love the compression of this sock! Enjoy it more for running than for skiing however, not as warm as I’d hoped. Would still recommend this sock for compression!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great socks that are warm and thin
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for a ski trip and he loves them. They are thin but warm and kept his feet dry. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Denton

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and fast Delivery! Well made product and I will see how they do this season.
customer_reviews.author: Mattsonlinedeals

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Note that each sock is specific for left or rifht foot. There is a marking that will indicate on ehich foot to use. Very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gabo

customer_reviews.title: I thought they worked great for heat
customer_reviews.text: Use these for snowboarding in high 20-40 temperatures in Southern and Northern California. I thought they worked great for heat, comfort, and sweat wicking properties
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Used these in Vermont over the weekend, perfect for skiing, not bulky and still kept my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: ZimEatsWaffles

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 3-pack and liked them so much I bought another. It has been alittle cold here at times and they have kept my feet and lower legs warm. I am going skiing next week and I am anxious to see how they fit in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too long
customer_reviews.text: These are too long. The socks are good quality but go all the way to the knee. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniannn

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of socks for skiing
customer_reviews.text: I tried these socks out over the holidays skiing. Very cold day but these socks were great and kept my feet nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: G. Duchene-Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used one pair one time on a super cold snowboard day with her school and said while all her friends complained about their cold feet, her feet were super warm! She loved the socks and colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Thin but warm
customer_reviews.text: Socks are not bulky but still didn't feel the cold even after hours outside in the freezing rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I have size 15 feet and these socks stretched to fit with no problem, no extra pulling. They are also very warm and lightweight like they stated. They also reach to my knees! I only bought one pair to try them out and now I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Great, supportive, warm ski socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are warm without being very bulky, making a more comfortable and stable fit in the ski boot. They go almost up to the knee, giving a sensation of stability to the lower leg. Well priced. You won't be sorry getting these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail, but don't fall for the review to the other $20 socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks failed to keep my feet warm while out on a cold day, I wasn't going to see how they did while skiing. Not worth the price and they run small - got medium and I am a solid 11 women and the socks were too tight, especially in the calves. I do better with the Merino wool socks I get at Costco, and a package of 4 pair is less than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good snowboarding socks for moderate cold temp
customer_reviews.text: These socks works for the snow. I used these socks while snowboarding in 23F temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Good sock, as described
customer_reviews.text: Liked the bright colors and design. Purchased for husband to use skiing. He hasn't worn them yet, but I have washed them and they washed nicely. Like that they are part Merino Wool which is important for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O.

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: These socks are wonderful. I've already told my children this is what they are getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found The Socks I Have Been Searching For
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a fortune on socks trying to find that special sock that can take the abuse I do to socks especially in the winter time. I have found the best socks I have ever owned. They keep my feet warm and dry and they do not creep down. I am going to buy a lot more of these fantastic socks
customer_reviews.author: Harold A.

customer_reviews.title: Toasty toes!
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet nice and warm while skiing, comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Bach

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry ALL day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 15 year old who was going Snowboarding for the 1st time. These socks were the bomb. They kept him dry and warm all day...and you and I both know he spent most of the day sliding on his backside, brushing up snow all over himself. Will buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great sock
customer_reviews.text: Great sock for the price. They run a tad small compared to other similar style socks. But fit good, very warm in snow and yet cool enough for moto socks. Purchased several more pairs
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in 9°F weather!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from snowboarding in 9°F weather in Vermont and I must say my feet were extremely warm the entire time. I didn't use any feet warmers in my boots. Wasn't nessessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Best wool-blend socks!
customer_reviews.text: Best medium-weight wool-blend socks. Love them for skiing and hiking. True to size. Nice fit over the calves. Hot pink and black is awesome. Arrived on time. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SeDaisi

customer_reviews.title: Possibly best for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Nice but not warm enough for hunting, next time out tried as inside liner ok but still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm in 7 degree weather while skiing. Did not bunch up and become uncomfortable at anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney LaCour

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and warm
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and just as ordered. Good fit and warm while in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: tsktsktsk

customer_reviews.title: Great socks! I specifically looked for these for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! I specifically looked for these for Christmas gifts. They were very well received by the outdoor adventurers in our family! I will purchase them again next year for others and myself! Working great at -6 degrees F yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Scotti

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work - cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Wife can wear wool. Even 2 sets she was cold
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kasanow

customer_reviews.title: Best socks ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson whom is on the high school snowboard team. He absolutely loves them. His feet stay dryer and warmer than any other types of socks.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm size 10.5 and the large/X-large are a perfect fit and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! They kept my feet warm with my snowboard boots & upper 20 degree temps!
customer_reviews.author: DominqueX3

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm!
customer_reviews.text: My feet stayed nice and warm skiing at Aspen this past weekend! Great sock, and no need to layer socks.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannan Oxos

customer_reviews.title: Great for skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my husband for Christmas and he said they worked great. He wants me to order more as they've been perfect for him to be on the slopes for hours skiing.
customer_reviews.author: snowprincess84

customer_reviews.title: Good soft material
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfection. Good soft material, very high quality, excellent cut. I'd buy it again and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great durable socks
customer_reviews.text: Theses socks have lasted all winter. For me, that is a miracle. I always war holes in even the most expensive socks. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Particia C.

customer_reviews.title: I like them for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wore it just to get a feel for them before I go skiing with them. I like them for the money, especially. I will wear them in a ski boot over MLK weekend and if they perform as well as they feel, I may purchase two more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A Byler

customer_reviews.title: Good fit !
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for skiing. Medium weight. Not real thin if that's what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable after tweaks.
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfortable. But, the stitching in the toe area is very prominent and needed to be repositioned a few times in order to avoid discomfort in my ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ski socks
customer_reviews.text: These are nice ski socks. Not bulky but snug fit as they are supposed to be. Feet were warm in ski boots
customer_reviews.author: ZanyforLife

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies to Blacks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these socks and instantly went from the bunnies to double black diamonds 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Triple R

product_meta.title: Ski Socks Women Wool Warmest - Best Lightweight Men Skiing Sock, Snowboard
feature_bullets: Lightweight Material: Not too thick, the light material allows the ski socks to fit comfortably in ski boots without altering the fit.
Soft and Comfortable Material: The ski socks feel great against the ski while skiing thanks to the highest quality yarn we use. They feature an ultra-comfortable sole and feel great in ski boots.

Merino Wool to Prevent Odor: Anti-odor properties help to prevent bacteria from forming in the ski socks, keeping feet feeling fresh. Moisture wicking technology ensures your socks don’t get heavy with perspiration or wet from snow. Feet feel great all day while skiing.
Thermal Regulating: Made of advanced special yarn, the ski socks provide superior warmth by provide thermal regulation to your feet, keeping heat in and cold out.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: At Pure Athlete we know we make the best ski socks and stand behind our products 100%. If at any point the ski socks don't live up to expectations, simply email us and we will either refund you or send you out a replacement. It is that simple.
